emails.label: Email System
emails.description: This feature flag enables or disables all emails sent by the server

saml.label: SAML Single-Sign-On
saml.description: This feature flag enables or disables the ability to sign in with Single sign-on

mfa.label: Two-factor authentication
mfa.description: This feature flag enables or disables the 2FA functionality

mfa-totp.label: App based Two-factor authentication
mfa-totp.description: This feature flag enables or disables the app based 2FA functionality. This is dependent on two-factor authentication being enabled.

mfa-fido.label: Fido based Two-factor authentication
mfa-fido.description: This feature flag enables or disables the fido security key based 2FA functionality. This is dependent on two-factor authentication being enabled.
